snippet.title: Dewdrop Dynasty - Teaser Trailer (2022)
snippet.description:
A first sneak peak of the adventure that awaits...

WISHLIST TODAY! https://bit.ly/WishlistDewdrop

┈  What is Firith? ┈

Firith is a indie game studio located in Akron, Ohio that focuses on creating family friendly experiences, that captures the same childhood nostalgia that got us into gaming. For us, it’s about creating an experience that inspires.

┈ Join the Community ┈
💬 Discord: https://discord.gg/PfvQb42​

┈  Check Out Our Games  ┈
🍁 Website: https://firith.studio/​
🕹️ Itch.io: https://firith.itch.io/​
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/FirithStudio

#DewdropDynasty #trailer #firith #gamedev #gamestudio
